name: Sunless Sea
blurb: Explore a vast underground ocean in your customised steamship!\nA PC & Mac game in glorious 2D from the creators of Fallen London.

rewards.reward: The Able Seaman: Thanks for supporting Sunless Sea! This base-level pledge earns you a place in the game's credits, and our undying gratitude.

The Zailor\u2019s Pack: A DRM-free digital copy of the game for your preferred platform (PC or Mac) as soon as it is released; your name in the credits; and a digital map of the known Unterzee to adorn your desktop while you play.

The Daguerreotypist\u2019s Pack: DRM-free digital copy of the game, desktop wallpaper of the known Unterzee, your name in the credits, and a PDF booklet featuring concept art, game lore and tips for successful adventuring.

The Explorer\u2019s Pack: All previous rewards, plus exclusive access to the closed beta of Sunless Sea, the moment it's in beta shape. Your feedback will help to shape the final game! (March is estimated beta delivery.)

The Pantherine Pack: All previous rewards, plus\r\na unique in-game ship\u2019s pet: the deadly Parabolan Panther, scourge of ratty stowaways! If you\u2019re a Fallen London player, you get the Parabolan Panther in your game too!

The Corsair\u2019s Pack: All previous rewards (yes, including the panther), plus a unique enemy in Sunless Sea: the Pirate Poet! Backers also get \r\nexclusive Fallen London content: The Museum of Mistakes - explore the Dadd Wing.

The Navigator Pack: All previous rewards, plus a unique ship: The Cladery Heart, a vessel with a dark history. The Navigator Pack also includes exclusive Fallen London content: Uncover the tale of the Cladery Heart and the Surgeon\u2019s Child.

The Pathfinder\u2019s Pack: All previous rewards, plus: a high quality matt-laminated A2 poster featuring a map of the Unterzee. And there's more: we will name a geographical feature in the game after you! This might be a bluff or a lonely outcrop, a group of stalagmites, a port, or even a deadly whirlpool.\r\n*This pledge level also includes an extra downloadable copy of Sunless Sea to share with a friend.*

The Officer\u2019s Pack: All previous rewards, plus your face in Sunless Sea! Our artist will create a character (crew, pirate, mysterious stranger...) based on your likeness. The resulting character will appear in both Sunless Sea and Fallen London!  We\u2019ll also send you a high quality A4 print of the you-based character. *Like the previous level,  this includes one downloadable copy of Sunless Sea to share with a friend.*

The Monster Pack: All previous rewards, plus you get to create a Sea Monster! Monster backers will work with Failbetter\u2019s artist to design and name a creature from the blackest depths of the Unterzee that will menace Sunless Sea players.  We\u2019ll also send you a high quality A4 print of your monster. *This pledge level also includes two extra copies of Sunless Sea - one more than the previous level.*

The Pioneer\u2019s Pack: Every single other reward on this list. All of them. And leave your mark in the world: design an island! Work with the Failbetter team to design a unique location in the game, with its own history and narrative. This can bear your name if you like (e.g., Smith's Landing). *Like the previous level,  this includes two downloadable copies of Sunless Sea to share with friends.*
